results.title: Combined Treatment with Hydrophilic and Lipophilic Statins Improves Neurological Outcomes Following Experimental Cardiac Arrest in Mice.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Combination treatment with @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly reduced @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal injury@@@ in the striatum and hippocampus, reduced @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@cerebral edema@@@, and improved general health at 4 days after @DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@/CPR.

citations.NLM: Nakayama S, Taguchi N, Isaka Y, Nakamura T, Tanaka M. Combined Treatment with Hydrophilic and Lipophilic Statins Improves Neurological Outcomes Following Experimental Cardiac Arrest in Mice. Neurocrit Care. 2020 Aug;33(1):64-72. PMID: 31591692
citations.BibTeX: @article{31591692, title={Combined Treatment with Hydrophilic and Lipophilic Statins Improves Neurological Outcomes Following Experimental Cardiac Arrest in Mice.}, author={Nakayama S and Taguchi N and Isaka Y and Nakamura T and Tanaka M}, journal={Neurocrit Care}, volume={33}, number={1}, pages={64-72}}

results.title: Simvastatin Reduces Neutrophils Infiltration Into Brain Parenchyma After Intracerebral Hemorrhage via Regulating Peripheral Neutrophils Apoptosis
results.text_hl: Our above data indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration distinctly ameliorated @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ and improved neurological function following @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang J, Shi X, Hao N, Chen Z, Wei L, Tan L, Chen Y, Feng H, Chen Q, Zhu G. Simvastatin Reduces Neutrophils Infiltration Into Brain Parenchyma After Intracerebral Hemorrhage via Regulating Peripheral Neutrophils Apoptosis Front Neurosci. 2018;12():977. PMID: 30631264

results.title: Simvastatin in traumatic brain injury: effect on brain edema mechanisms.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@traumatic brain injury@@@: effect on @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ mechanisms.

citations.NLM: Béziaud T, Ru Chen X, El Shafey N, Fréchou M, Teng F, Palmier B, Beray-Berthat V, Soustrat M, Margaill I, Plotkine M, Marchand-Leroux C, Besson VC. Simvastatin in traumatic brain injury: effect on brain edema mechanisms. Crit Care Med. 2011 Oct;39(10):2300-7. PMID: 21666443

results.title: Simvastatin treatment in surgically induced brain injury in rats.
results.text_hl: The objective of this study was to evaluate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ by preventing @DISEASE_Glut1_Deficiency_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536830 @@@BBB disruption@@@ and improves neurologic status after surgically-induced @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@brain injury@@@ (@DISEASE_Brain_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@SBI@@@).

citations.NLM: Lee S, Jadhav V, Lekic T, Hyong A, Allard M, Stier G, Martin R, Zhang J. Simvastatin treatment in surgically induced brain injury in rats. Acta Neurochir Suppl. 2008;102():401-4. PMID: 19388355

results.title: Therapeutic effects of a combinatorial treatment of simvastatin and bone marrow stromal cells on experimental embolic stroke.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ receiving a dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in combination with BMSC administration demonstrated a significant reduction in @DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological deficits@@@, a significant reduction in @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ volume and a significant decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain oedema@@@.

citations.NLM: Pirzad Jahromi G, Seidi S, Sadr SS, Shabanzadeh AP, Keshavarz M, Kaka GR, Hosseini SK, Sohanaki H, Charish J. Therapeutic effects of a combinatorial treatment of simvastatin and bone marrow stromal cells on experimental embolic stroke. Basic Clin Pharmacol Toxicol. 2012 Jun;110(6):487-93. PMID: 22182305

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates sepsis-induced blood-brain barrier integrity loss.
results.text_hl: In contrast, grading of @CHEMICAL_Evans_Blue @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005070 @@@Evans blue@@@ staining (P = 0.020), BBB permeability to @CHEMICAL_Evans_Blue @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005070 @@@Evans blue@@@ dye (P = 0.031), and @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ levels (P = 0.009) in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ receiving CLP plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were significantly lower than those receiving CLP alone.

citations.NLM: Yang CH, Kao MC, Shih PC, Li KY, Tsai PS, Huang CJ. Simvastatin attenuates sepsis-induced blood-brain barrier integrity loss. J Surg Res. 2015 Apr;194(2):591-598. PMID: 25534234

results.title: Simvastatin pretreatment protects cerebrum from neuronal injury by decreasing the expressions of phosphor-CaMK II and AQP4 in ischemic stroke rats.
results.text_hl: The results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced degenerated cells and @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ while decreasing the protein expressions of phosphor-CaMK II and @GENE_AQP4 @GENE_25293 @@@AQP4@@@, and increasing the ratios of @GENE_BCL2 @GENE_24224 @@@Bcl-2@@@/@GENE_BAX @GENE_24887 @@@Bax@@@, which was independent of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering effect.

citations.NLM: Zhu MX, Lu C, Xia CM, Qiao ZW, Zhu DN. Simvastatin pretreatment protects cerebrum from neuronal injury by decreasing the expressions of phosphor-CaMK II and AQP4 in ischemic stroke rats. J Mol Neurosci. 2014 Dec;54(4):591-601. PMID: 24752488

results.title: Anti-inflammatory effects of Simvastatin in patients with acute intracerebral hemorrhage in an intensive care unit
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment improved the degree of @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ and the amount of @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ (Fig. 2).

citations.NLM: Zhou X, Chen J, Wang C, Wu L. Anti-inflammatory effects of Simvastatin in patients with acute intracerebral hemorrhage in an intensive care unit Exp Ther Med. 2017 Dec;14(6):6193-6200. PMID: 29285177

results.title: Combination therapy with fenofibrate, a peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor alpha agonist, and simvastatin, a 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitor, on experimental traumatic brain injury.
results.text_hl: First, our dose-effect study demonstrated that the most efficient dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (37.5 mg/kg) reduced @DISEASE_Epilepsy_Post_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D004834 @@@post-traumatic neurological deficits@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin Treatment in Traumatic Brain Injury: Operation Brain Trauma Therapy.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has demonstrated potent antineuroinflammatory and @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001929 @@@brain edema@@@ reducing effects and has shown promise in promoting functional recovery in pre-clinical models of @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@traumatic brain injury@@@ (@DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@).
